definition.procedurexml: <xml xmlns="https://developers.google.com/blockly/xml"><variables><variable type="Number" id="PowerOfSlowness">PowerOfSlowness</variable></variables><block type="event_trigger" deletable="false" x="40" y="40"><field name="trigger">no_ext_trigger</field><next><block type="variables_set_number"><field name="VAR">local:PowerOfSlowness</field><value name="VAL"><block type="math_dual_ops"><field name="OP">MULTIPLY</field><value name="A"><block type="math_number"><field name="NUM">0.95</field></block></value><value name="B"><block type="math_number"><field name="NUM">-1</field></block></value></block></value><next><block type="entity_set_movement"><value name="entity"><block type="entity_from_deps"/></value><value name="vx"><block type="math_dual_ops"><field name="OP">MULTIPLY</field><value name="A"><block type="entity_vel_x"><value name="entity"><block type="entity_from_deps"/></value></block></value><value name="B"><block type="variables_get_number"><field name="VAR">local:PowerOfSlowness</field></block></value></block></value><value name="vy"><block type="math_dual_ops"><field name="OP">MULTIPLY</field><value name="A"><block type="entity_vel_y"><value name="entity"><block type="entity_from_deps"/></value></block></value><value name="B"><block type="variables_get_number"><field name="VAR">local:PowerOfSlowness</field></block></value></block></value><value name="vz"><block type="math_dual_ops"><field name="OP">MULTIPLY</field><value name="A"><block type="entity_vel_z"><value name="entity"><block type="entity_from_deps"/></value></block></value><value name="B"><block type="variables_get_number"><field name="VAR">local:PowerOfSlowness</field></block></value></block></value></block></next></block></next></block></xml>
